name: Scroll Quest: The Legend of Tsu-Zen Wan Against the Evil Ninja Clan
name_original: Scroll Quest: The Legend of Tsu-Zen Wan Against the Evil Ninja Clan
description:
My College project

Tsu-Zen Wan and Gui-Long must defeat the ninja clan and save the sacred kung fu scrolls

The game is in brazilian portuguese but may have an english version soon!
